title: (x) Ross Dress for Less - custom {Snoopy}
content:
I think it was done by Bill Moore and Associates. They are a primarily a sign company, but this page says they designed the logo as well.   
   
 [http://www.billmoore.com/pf2rs001.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125505/http:/www.billmoore.com/pf2rs001.html)
author: snoooopy

comments.content: Why is it that everytime I see that logo, I think of �Cross-dress for less�?
That's a question for your shrink. :-P
If their dresses are going to shrink, I won't be buying them at Ross, that's for darn sure...
